name: A Kebon
description:
A Kebon

This is a game where you mantain your Corn and Tomato garden to get a profit!

How to play:

  1. Plant
  2. Maintain
  3. Harvest
  4. Sell
  5. Reach Goal

NOTE:

  • This game was used to complete my mid-term test.
  • This game uses Cartoon Farm Crops by False Wisp Studios for the plants.
  • Thanks to Spyro for creating UI icons for this game.
  • This game also uses UI pack and UI pack: RPG extension by Kenney Vleugels (www.kenney.nl) for additional UIs.
